Uses of Class
uk.org.taverna.server.client.ServerException

Packages that use ServerException
uk.org.taverna.server.client Provides classes for interacting with a Taverna Server instance. 
uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection Provides classes for the underlying connection to a Taverna Server instance. 
 

Uses of ServerException in uk.org.taverna.server.client
 

Subclasses of ServerException in uk.org.taverna.server.client
 class IllegalUserAccessException
          This exception is thrown when a user, who is not the owner of a Run, tries to access methods that manipulate the security context of a Run .
 class RunInputsNotSetException
          This exception is used to indicate that one or more inputs to a Run were not set before attempting to start it running.
 class RunNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown if the server cannot find the run that has been requested or operated on.
 class RunStateException
          This exception is thrown if a Run is in an incorrect state to be manipulated in the way that has been requested.
 class ServerAtCapacityException
          Indicate that the remote server is already running its maximum number of configured workflows.
 

Uses of ServerException in uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection
 

Subclasses of ServerException in uk.org.taverna.server.client.connection
 class AccessForbiddenException
          This exception is thrown if the server returns a forbidden error code (403).
 class AttributeNotFoundException
          This exception is thrown if the server returns a not found error code (404).
 class AuthenticationFailureException
          This exception is thrown when there is an internal (HTTP protocol level) problem with authentication.
 class AuthorizationException
          This exception is thrown if the server returns an unauthorized error code (401).
 class InternalServerException
          This exception is thrown if the server returns an internal error code (50x).
 class ServerResponseException
          This is the abstract superclass of all the exceptions generated by server responses.
 class UnexpectedResponseException
          This exception is thrown if the server returns an unexpected status code for the operation performed.
